name: Planning changes: finding a suitable plot and getting planning permission for sustainable self-build
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: The National Planning Policy Framework (NPPF) has theoretically made it easier for self-builders to get planning permission. This session will explain what new opportunities are available to self builders and what steps should be taken to ensure the path to planning permission on a permissible plot is as simple and straight forward as it can be.

presentations.name: Finding your way through the planning maze
presentations.speakers: Sally Tagg, Managing Director, Foxley Tagg Planning

presentations.name: Ten top tips for finding a plot
Promoting growth in the self build sector
